code: export var fetchArticles=function fetchArticles(articles){return{type:'FETCH_ARTICLES',payload:articles};};export var updateArticle=function updateArticle(article){return{type:'UPDATE_ARTICLE',payload:article};};export var fetchCategories=function fetchCategories(categories){return{type:'FETCH_CATEGORIES',payload:categories};};export var setSearchByText=function setSearchByText(searchText){return{type:'SET_SEARCH_TEXT',payload:searchText};};export var fetchTotal=function fetchTotal(total){return{type:'FETCH_TOTAL',payload:total};};
